desc: The SHELL-SHOCKS pad has been tested and proven to reduce the effects up a rear head impact by up to 40%. The pad is designed for sports where a helmet is worn including football, skateboarding, snowboarding, rodeo, hockey, and more. Our protective beanie can also provide protection for those that don't wear a helmet.

layout.text: PROTECTING YOUNG ATHLETES - IN ANY SPORT OR ACTIVITY
Radically Active's Shell-Shock Technology delivers powerful head injury protection across a wide range of sports for active athletes of any age.
